hook.text: And she said... Dialogue brings moments to life instantly.

buildup.text: Direct quotes are more engaging than paraphrasing.

discovery.text: Even recreated dialogue feels more authentic than description.

twist.text: Use dialogue sparingly at key moments for maximum impact.

climax.text: Dialogue breaks monotony and adds voices to your speech.

punchline.text: Quote them directly. It brings the scene alive.

quiz.question: Why is dialogue powerful?
options: It brings scenes to life with real voices
